Extremities: Pain in right popliteal space down leg, which feels paralyzed
Shooting pain in back of both wrist joints
Abdomen: Pains in abdomen, hepatic region and of transverse colon, also in gall-bladder and right inguinal region and spermatic cords

name: Betonica
details: Produces pains in various parts. Stitches in right temple. Inability to concentrate mind.
